name: DeleteMiroProject
description:
Delete a project from a team in Miro's Enterprise plan.

This tool deletes a specified project within a team while retaining all boards and users. Available only to Enterprise plan users with Company Admin privileges. Ensure the required scope 'projects:write' is available.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization from which the project will be deleted.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization from which you want to delete a project.

parameters.name: team_id_for_project_deletion
parameters.description: The ID of the team from which you want to delete a project in Miro.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team from which you want to delete a project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to delete within the Miro team.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project that you want to delete.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.description: The ID of the organization from which you want to delete a project.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization from which you want to delete a project.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team from which you want to delete a project.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team from which you want to delete a project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project that you want to delete.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project that you want to delete.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
